hostlist.1.name: AdGuard DNS filter
hostlist.1.description: Filter composed of several other filters (AdGuard Base filter, Social Media filter, Tracking Protection filter, Mobile Ads filter, EasyList and EasyPrivacy) and simplified specifically to be better compatible with DNS-level ad blocking.

hostlist.2.name: AdAway Default Blocklist
hostlist.2.description: AdAway is an open source ad blocker for Android using the hosts file.

hostlist.3.name: Peter Lowe's Blocklist
hostlist.3.description: Blocking with ad server and tracking server hostnames.

hostlist.4.name: Dan Pollock's List
hostlist.4.description: Blocks certain pop-up traps, prevents user tracking, blocks most advertising.

hostlist.5.name: OISD Blocklist Basic
hostlist.5.description: Blocks ads/trackers and prioritizes functionality over blocking.

hostlist.23.name: WindowsSpyBlocker - Hosts spy rules
hostlist.23.description: Block spying and tracking on Windows.

hostlist.6.name: Dandelion Sprout's Game Console Adblock List
hostlist.6.description: Much like there's now lists for AdGuard Home and Pi-hole to block ads on smart-TVs, here's an attempt from me at doing the same for videogame consoles with AdGuard Home.

hostlist.7.name: Perflyst and Dandelion Sprout's Smart-TV Blocklist
hostlist.7.description: This is a blocklist to block smart-TVs sending metadata back home, sometimes with the added benefit of blocking interface ads for apps and movie services.

hostlist.13.name: NOR: Dandelion Sprouts nordiske filtre
hostlist.13.description: Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters (for AdGuard Home, and for AdGuard for Android/Windows' DNS filtering).

hostlist.14.name: POL: Polish filters for Pi hole

hostlist.15.name: KOR: YousList
hostlist.15.description: Block filter for advertisements, mainly on Korean sites.

hostlist.17.name: SWE: Frellwit's Swedish Hosts File
hostlist.17.description: Aims to get rid of ads, tracking, scams & badware on (mostly) Swedish websites.

hostlist.18.name: ITA: Filtri-DNS
hostlist.18.description: Tentative hosts file for Italian sites created from Easylist Italy and ADB X Files.

hostlist.20.name: MKD: Macedonian Pi-hole Blocklist
hostlist.20.description: This is a list to block unwanted domains that serve ads on Macedonian websites.

hostlist.21.name: CHN: anti-AD
hostlist.21.description: Committed to being the highest hit rate ad filtering list in the Chinese region, achieving precise ad blocking and privacy protection.

hostlist.22.name: IDN: ABPindo
hostlist.22.description: ABPindo is an additional filter to complement EasyList to block annoying ads on Indonesian and Malaysian language sites.

hostlist.10.name: Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin
hostlist.10.description: A blocklist to protect users against untrustworthy sites.

hostlist.11.name: Online Malicious URL Blocklist
hostlist.11.description: A blocklist of malicious websites that are being used for malware distribution, based on the Database dump of Abuse.ch URLhaus.

hostlist.12.name: Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List
hostlist.12.description: Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List (for AdGuard Home, and for AdGuard for Android/Windows' DNS filtering).

hostlist.8.name: NoCoin Filter List
hostlist.8.description: This is an adblock list to block browser-based crypto mining.

hostlist.9.name: The Big List of Hacked Malware Web Sites
hostlist.9.description: A list of web sites that are hacked with malware, ransomware or trojans.

hostlist.24.name: 1Hosts (Lite)
hostlist.24.description: Safeguard your device(s) against pesky ads, trackers, and malware.

hostlist.25.name: KOR: List-KR DNS
hostlist.25.description: A DNS version of List-KR, a filter for websites in Korean language.

hostlist.26.name: TUR: turk-adlist
hostlist.26.description: Ad servers list to block ads and annoying elements on Turkish sites.

hostlist.27.name: OISD Blocklist Full
hostlist.27.description: Blocks ads/trackers and prioritizes functionality over blocking. Compared to the basic version, the chances of a false-positive are higher.

hostlist.28.name: Energized Spark
hostlist.28.description: A list of domains that serve ads, tracking scripts and malware from multiple reputable sources.
